message: Murneyhouse.ca is now live in beta. Working furiously to debug the review validation and submission logic. The Contact Us card seems to be working now, you can try sending us a message if you don't mind entering your email to check if auto-responder works.
The Rooms and Booking pages are now up and running - feel free to poke around and let me know if you find any glitches. Also, testing the submission functionality for reviews and contact forms, G.
